data.title: Break Through Tech AI Information Portal | Ha Dong - LinkedIn
data.snippet:
# Ha Dong’s Post

Ha Dong

 Report this post

I’m happy to share that I have been accepted to Break Through Tech AI at MIT Schwarzman College of Computing! Starting this June, I will be joining an 18-month fellowship to further technical skills critical for machine learning and AI applications, which I hope to integrate into my future research career in life sciences and healthcare. I owe a huge thank you to Arjun Kejriwal and Pranjal Chalise for introducing me to this incredible opportunity! The application for this year’s program is open until March 18! You can learn more and apply here:

Break Through Tech AI Information Portal

data.title: Dong Ha Kim Ph.D. Professor (Full) at Ewha Womans University
data.snippet:
Prof. Dong Ha Kim received Ph.D. in the Department of Fiber and Polymer Science at Seoul National University. He performed postdoctoral researches in the Polymer Science and Engineering Department at the University of Massachusetts at Amherst and in the Materials Science Department at the Max Planck Institute for Polymer Research. He joined the Samsung Electronics Co. in the Memory Division of Semiconductor R & D Center as a senior scientist. He assumed a faculty position in the Department of Chemistry and Nano Science at Ewha Womans University in 2006. He is currently is a Full Professor, Ewha Fellow and Fellow of the Royal Society of Chemistry. His research interests include development of hybrid nanostructures for energy, environment, memory, display, and theragnosis. [...] Jun Choi
